attributes.action: Allow criminal procedings against the MP's caught swindling the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recent weeks we have read and seen on the television news that some members of parliment have been caught swindling the tax payer. One of these MPs Mr Elliot Morely claimed £16,000 for a mortgage he had already paid. If a person in any other walk of life had done this they would be investigated for obtaining property by deception. Justice needs to be done to these members. It is bad enough that they are claiming fraudulently but then for no procedings to be taken against them makes them appear above the law. Mr Brown, please allow justice to be done on these members.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
